display static-user ip-address 203.0.113.110

  Static user Gateway      :    203.0.113.1

  Static user MAC address  :    -

  Initiative detect        :    On
  Export the route         :    On
  Static user status       :    Detecting
  Vpn Instance             :    -
  Keep Online              :    No
